com.epimorphics.jsonrdf.impl

Class EncoderDefault

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.jsonrdf.impl.EncoderDefault
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncoderPlugin

    public class EncoderDefault
extends Object
implements EncoderPlugin
    Implements the default encoding rules for converting RDF resources to JSON.
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Dave Reynolds
